title: optgroup element
description: The optgroup element represents a group of option elements with a common label.

assertions.title: convey the group role
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to know that options are in a group.

assertions.title: convey the name of the optgroup
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to know how the options are grouped.

assertions.title: convey the boundaries of the optgroup
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to know when they enter and exit an optgroup.
